    What's Included


    data-tbsp-component="text" > Product Details


    1. data-tbsp-component="text" > A 10.5-inch pan that braises, sears, steams, strains, sautes, fries, boils, bakes, serves, stores…does it all!

    2. data-tbsp-component="text" > Our nonstick ceramic coating is made without potentially toxic materials like PFAS (including PTFEs and PFOAs), lead and cadmium

    3. data-tbsp-component="text" > Featuring Thermakind® — our exclusive, most advanced, 50% longer lasting ceramic nonstick coating


    data-tbsp-component="text" > Specs


    1. data-tbsp-component="text" > 19.9 in. length, 10.5 in. diameter, 2.8 in. depth, 5.7 in. height with lid

    2. data-tbsp-component="text" > 2.6 qt. capacity

    3. data-tbsp-component="text" > Lightweight construction (3 lb. body)

    4. data-tbsp-component="text" > Compatible with all cooktops, including induction

    Frequently Asked Questions



    Thermakind®, our proprietary ceramic nonstick coating, is made without potentially toxic materials like PFAS (including PTFE and PFOA), lead, and cadmium. PFAS are nicknamed “Forever Chemicals” because they do not break down easily in the environment or in the human body. As a result, they bioaccumulate over time, making them a highly concerning chemical group.




    We offer a 3-year limited warranty for our ceramic nonstick cookware. If you follow our easy care instructions, we’ll help out if anything goes wrong within three years from your date of purchase. https://fromourplace.com/pages/warranty">Read more about our policy here.




    Our 13-piece ceramic nonstick Cookware Set includes an Always Pan (10.5"), Mini Always Pan (8.5"), Perfect Pot (5.5 qt), and Mini Perfect Pot (2.5 qt). This complete solution replaces more than 15 traditional cookware pieces, while individual pots, pans, and accessories require separate purchases to build a full kitchen setup.




    Quality ceramic cookware sets like ours offer exceptional value. You save money versus buying pieces individually, replace more than 15 traditional items with just 4 pieces, and get a more advanced, longer-lasting nonstick coating. The multifunctional design and non-toxic materials make it a smart long-term investment for any home-cook.

    To make sure you’re getting the most out of your ceramic nonstick cookware, always cook with high-smoke-point oil or fat, and avoid aerosol sprays.




    Our Cookware Set is ideal for families of 2 to 6 people. The Cookware Duo handles main dishes for 4 to 6 servings, while the Mini Cookware Duo is perfect for sides or smaller portions.
